message: Accept and we can split the remaining 10 rounds between us!
Meet me halfway, Bob! We can still have a good split!
This is my best offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not budging, Alice. You're going to have to make a better offer!
I'm not going to give you the majority, Bob. Meet me in the middle!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm calling the shots now!
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or walk away!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking control!
This is my last stand, Bob. Take it or we both walk away with nothing!
You've pushed me too far, Alice. I'm taking the majority and leaving you with scraps!
